CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS connection( connID int GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1 INCREMENT BY 1) not null, loginUserID int DEFAULT 1, connName VARCHAR NOT NULL, --服务器名称 connHost VARCHAR NOT NULL, --数据库连接地址 connPort VARCHAR NOT NULL, --端口号 connDbName VARCHAR NOT NULL, --数据库名称 connUserName VARCHAR NOT NULL,--用户名 connPwd VARCHAR,--密码 createDate TIMESTAMP WITHOUT time ZONE,-- 连接创建时间 PRIMARY KEY (connID), FOREIGN KEY (loginUserID) REFERENCES loginUser (loginUserID)ON DELETE CASCADE );

prop_coll.sql: select pid,datname,client_addr client,state,query_start,query from hh_stat_activity where datname = ?

prop.sql: select pid, datname, query, client_addr client, now() - hh_stat_activity.query_start as duration , state from hh_stat_activity where query <> ''::text and now() - hh_stat_activity.query_start > interval '1 second' and state <> 'idle';

dataservice.datatypelist: SELECT tn, CASE WHEN typmodin = 0 THEN false ELSE true END AS has_length, (SELECT count(*) FROM hh_attribute a, hh_class c, hh_namespace n WHERE a.atttypid = ts.oid AND a.attnum > 0 AND a.attrelid = c.oid AND c.relnamespace = n.oid AND n.nspname NOT IN ('hh_catalog', 'information_schema')) AS usage_count FROM (SELECT typname AS tn, typrelid, typelem, typtype, typcategory, typbasetype, typmodin, oid FROM hh_type UNION SELECT format_type(oid, null) AS tn, typrelid, typelem, typtype, typcategory, typbasetype, typmodin, oid FROM hh_type) AS ts WHERE typrelid = 0 AND typelem = 0 AND typtype != 'p' AND typcategory != 'X' AND typbasetype = 0 UNION SELECT 'serial', false, 0 UNION SELECT 'bigserial', false, 0 ORDER BY 1
dataservice.languagelist: SELECT lanname as name, oid as id FROM hh_language WHERE lanname NOT IN ('internal', 'c') ORDER BY lanname
dataservice.rolelist: SELECT rolname as name, oid as id FROM hh_roles ORDER BY rolname
dataservice.serverlist: SELECT srvname as name, oid as id FROM hh_foreign_server
dataservice.classname: SELECT n.nspname, c.relname FROM hh_class c, hh_namespace n WHERE c.relnamespace = n.oid AND c.oid = ?
dataservice.functionname: SELECT n.nspname, p.proname, hh_get_function_identity_arguments(p.oid) as args FROM hh_proc p, hh_namespace n WHERE p.pronamespace = n.oid AND p.oid = ?
dataservice.typename: SELECT n.nspname, t.typname FROM hh_type t, hh_namespace n WHERE t.typnamespace = n.oid AND (t.oid = ? OR t.typrelid = ?)
dataservice.seqsqls: select hh_class.*,hh_authid.rolname from hh_class,hh_authid where relname like '%_seq' and hh_authid.oid=hh_class.relowner and hh_authid.rolname=

prop_coll.sql: SELECT t.typname AS name, --类型名称 t.typtype AS type_kind, c.oid AS id FROM hh_type t, hh_class c WHERE t.typnamespace = ? AND t.typrelid = c.oid AND t.typtype = 'c' AND c.relkind = 'c' UNION SELECT d.typname, d.typtype, d.oid FROM hh_type d WHERE d.typnamespace = ? AND d.typtype IN ('d', 'e','r') ORDER BY name

prop.sql: SELECT tn, CASE WHEN typmodIN = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS has_length, ( SELECT count(*) FROM hh_ATTRIBUTE a, hh_CLASS c, hh_namespace n WHERE a.atttypid = ts.oid AND a.attnum > 0 AND a.attrelid = c.oid AND c.relnamespace = n.oid AND n.nspNAME NOT IN ('hh_catalog', 'information_schema')) AS usage_count FROM ( SELECT typNAME AS tn, typrelid, typelem, typtype, typcategory, typbasetype, typmodin, oid FROM hh_TYPE UNION SELECT format_type(oid, null) AS tn,typrelid, typelem, typtype, typcategory, typbasetype, typmodin, oid FROM hh_type) AS ts WHERE typrelid = 0 AND typelem = 0 AND typTYPE != 'p' AND typcategory != 'X' AND typbasetype = 0 UNION SELECT 'serial', false, 0 UNION SELECT 'bigserial', false, 0 ORDER BY 1

prop_item.sql: SELECT t.typname AS name, c.oid AS id,t.typtype AS type_kind FROM hh_type t, hh_class c WHERE t.typnamespace = ? AND t.typrelid=? AND t.typrelid = c.oid UNION SELECT d.typname,d.oid,d.typtype FROM hh_type d WHERE d.typnamespace = ? AND d.oid=?

compositesource.sql: SELECT a.attname, hh_catalog.format_type(a.atttypid, a.atttypmod) as datatype FROM hh_type t, hh_class c, hh_attribute a WHERE t.typrelid = c.oid AND c.reltype=t.oid AND c.oid = a.attrelid AND t.typtype = 'c' AND c.relkind = 'c' AND c.oid = ? AND a.attnum > 0 AND NOT a.attisdropped ORDER BY a.attnum

basicsource.sql: SELECT hh_catalog.format_type(t.typbasetype, t.typtypmod) as base_type, hh_catalog.array_to_string(ARRAY( SELECT hh_catalog.hh_get_constraintdef(r.oid, true) FROM hh_catalog.hh_constraint r WHERE t.oid = r.contypid), ' ') as check, typdefault, typnotnull FROM hh_type t WHERE t.typtype = 'd' AND t.oid = ?

enumsource.sql: SELECT e.enumlabel FROM hh_type t, hh_enum e WHERE t.oid = e.enumtypid AND t.typtype = 'e' AND t.oid = ? ORDER BY e.enumsortorder

prop_coll.sql: select * from hh_prepared_xacts

mem_monitor.sql: select (dbmon_free()::int[])[2]/1024 as total_size, (dbmon_free()::int[])[3]/1024 as usered_siz, (dbmon_free()::int[])[4]/1024 as free_size

show_copy.sql: select *,hh_xlog_location_diff(sent_location, replay_location) as hhxlog from hh_stat_replication

show_copyback.sql: SELECT CASE WHEN hh_last_xlog_receive_location() = hh_last_xlog_replay_location() THEN 0 ELSE EXTRACT (EPOCH FROM now() - hh_last_xact_replay_timestamp()) END AS log_delay;

prop.sql: SELECT refobjid,string_agg(hh_catalog.hh_describe_object(classid, objid, 0),' ;') AS "desc",'' status,'' extendName FROM hh_catalog.hh_depend WHERE refclassid = 'hh_catalog.hh_extension'::hh_catalog.regclass AND refobjid in (SELECT e.oid FROM hh_catalog.hh_extension e WHERE e.extname ~ ? ORDER BY 1) AND deptype = 'e' group by refobjid;

prop_coll.sql: select extname as name,extowner,extnamespace,extrelocatable,extversion,extconfig,extcondition from hh_extension;
